name: Puzzle Tower (oleksier)
description: It is a single player 3D puzzle game. The goal is to dump or destroy all balls or other items inside of a mechanism (so-called Tower) to collect as many points as possible. You will face different kinds of puzzles where you will combine self-destroying balls, unlock cross locked disks, flip towers and avoid obstacles. All of this will happen in two different environments: cold space and hot desert. Have a good luck explorer!
